Besides, at least he's not George Bush.[/bq]
If you ask me George Bush was the 4th worst president of all time.  Obama is the 5th worst president of all time.

Shockingly we've actually have had worse.  If you're wondering how can anyone be worse than Bush we've had a president that literally criminalized disagreeing with his party or supporting the opposing party and threw people in jail for voting "wrong".
